column5: Ok folks I ahve started up an Honor Derby for Lake scugog...  I will post the link here but since I am hosting it on a different forum I am not sure if I will get wrist slapped.  http://onthebog.thewhistle.ca/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3
Not that I will be entering,but that statement kind of stood out  Good luck with it though.

If your not a member of the forum it makes it a bit difficult to post your results on the forum don't you think? Not like your paying to join anythig, just a few people have mentioned it before to do something like this on the bog for the locals or others hat fish the bog. Not a big deal really just for fun.  Have a good one.
